name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForCOVID19ConfirmedInfection
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for COVID19 Confirmed Infection
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to confirmed COVID-19 infection.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19 and complications due to COVID-19, (e.g., Acute bronchitis caused by SARS-CoV-2).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes lab tests confirming COVID-19 infection.)
